name: Max2D game:attack on titan 2D mobile
description: this game can only be played in the Max2D application by way. download the Max2D application and also download this game. after that you go to the file manager and find the game file then you have to extract the file and move the file to a file named [mobilegameingine> project and click ok] and the last one you go to the Max2D application and click the game and warning this game can only be played on android and the last one at next update this will can play in apk for easy download and play the game
